backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, observations, kaizens, photos, and access control with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking new operator-activity manager page and routing updates to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including new manager operator activity page and routing changes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and layout setup defining authenticated routes, manager pages, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard redirecting unauthenticated users to login and showing a loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based access guard allowing only admins to access certain routes and showing denial UI otherwise.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyState: Reusable empty-state component with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenAss: UI panel allowing managers to assign a department and required tools to a Kaizen.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenDec: Panel for approving or rejecting a Kaizen with required manager comments.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenPho: Displays implementation photos for a Kaizen, including loading and empty states.
Image uploader for Kaizen items with validation, progress tracking, and upload mutation.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenSta: Displays a status badge for a Kaizen using predefined labels and variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Main app header with navigation, user menu, admin links, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple layout wrapper that centers and constrains page content.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to enter name and create their profile via mutation.
Hook that periodically pings backend activity when user is active and identity is present.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the current user profile and checking admin status via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and mutations for observations, kaizens, photos, and user actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Allows admins to look up users by principal and assign roles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders dashboard with stats, recent kaizens, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenDetailPa: Displays detailed view of a Kaizen with admin actions and photo management.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenListPage: Shows searchable and filterable list of Kaizen suggestions with role-based visibility.
Form page for submitting a new Kaizen entry, handling validation, submission, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login UI and redirects authenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/manager/AnalyticsPage: Manager dashboard computing and displaying analytics for observations and Kaizens using various metrics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/GapsPage.tsx: Displays low-activity areas and departments based on recent submissions to identify engagement gaps.
frontend/src/pages/manager/InactivityDas: Shows inactive operators based on a configurable inactivity threshold and supports CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/manager/OperatorActiv: Lists operator activity with sortable metrics and inactivity calculations to monitor overall engagement.
frontend/src/pages/observations/Observat: Detail view for a single observation showing metadata, description, and navigation controls.
Renders a form for creating a new observation with type, title, description, and optional area, and submits via a mutation hook.
Displays a filterable and searchable list of observations, limiting visibility based on user role and allowing navigation to create new entries.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides analytics helpers for counting submissions, top areas, approval rates, decision times, and low-activity segments.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV file from an array of data objects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL or session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and versioning information.
